resources.string:
Thanks for choosing NotesTracker!

 Instructions:
 Swipe left or click the three horizontal lines to manage your note categories.
 To create a category, press the "Create Category" button. When you create a new category, you will be prompted to enter the name of the new category.
 To delete or edit a category, press the three vertical dots in the top corner, and click on the desired option.
 To create a note, navigate to the category you want to put the note under, then press the '+' button in the bottom left corner.
 To edit or view a note, tap on the note.
 To delete a note, hold down on the note until the prompt shows up.
